pageContext.claim: “The Democrats are so focused on hurting the Republican Party and the President that they are unable to get anything done because of it, including legislation on gun safety, lowering of prescription drug prices, infrastructure, etc. So bad for our Country!”
pageContext.analysis: The House of Representatives, which is controlled by the Democrats, passed 252 bills as of Oct. 2019, but in order for a bill to become law, it needs to pass the Senate, which is controlled by Republicans. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell has declined to bring the majority of those bills up for a vote. The Senate has passed 76 bills in the same time period.
